summary: In rural Alabama, two couples find themselves in a fight for survival. Running from a maniac (The Tin Man) bent on killing them, they flee deep into the woods and seek refuge in a house.
cast: Michael Madsen|Reynaldo Rosales|Heidi Dippold|Julie Ann Emery|J.P. Davis|Lew Temple|Leslie Easterbrook|Bill Moseley|Pawel Delag|Weronika Rosati|Alanna Bale|Mark Fierer|Florentyna Synowiecka|Andrew Gorzen|Albert Pietrzak|Bobby Neutz|Jeffrey de Graft-Johnson|Holly McClure|Joe Goodman|Jacob Bertrand|Lance Henriksen|Lisa Haley
title: House
